definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to formalize/formalism in art (esp. as proscribed in USSR and PRC)

sentences.english: But the formulae for calculating the inner stress of the arch pipes caused by wind oad is confined to equal section.
sentences.chinese: 而現有計算拱管風載內力的公式僅限於等截面範圍。

sentences.english: Making use of the expression of the image-force, we analyze the interaction of the dislocation with the interface and the boundary.
sentences.chinese: 通過像力公式可以分析自由邊界和界面對位錯的作用。

sentences.english: Also, a formula calculating the pressure drop of series throttle holes in the liquid propellant transporting sys…
sentences.chinese: 文中還給出了液路系統中各串聯節流孔壓降公式。

sentences.english: So we use the de Broglie formula.
sentences.chinese: 因此用到了德布羅意的公式。

sentences.english: This formula, however, doesn't work because women keep score differently.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個公式無效，因爲女人自有她不同的記分法。

sentences.english: According to this assumption, a formula to calculate the amount of shells in one hail suppression operation at a site has been deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推導出每個炮點一次防雹作業用彈量的計算公式。

sentences.english: MU( 1) is a class of minimal unsatisfiable formulas with the deficiency of the number of clauses and variables to be one.
sentences.chinese: 是子句數與變元數的差等於1的極小不可滿足公式類。

sentences.english: We also offer tailor-made capsule according to client's formula.
sentences.chinese: 我們還提供度身定造膠囊根據客戶的公式。

sentences.english: It is whatever the formula is for z as a function of x and y.
sentences.chinese: 無論公式裏，z是x和y的什麼函數。

sentences.english: In the project of building road , calculating the quantity of earthworkapplies approximative formulation.
sentences.chinese: 在築路工程中，土方量的計算一直沿用近似公式。

sentences.english: When we add things together,we get Green's theorem in its full generality.
sentences.chinese: 把式子都加起來了，就得到了完整的格林公式。

sentences.english: The calculating formula used for the intumescent velocity was presented and was applied to the model proposed.
sentences.chinese: 用於膨脹速度的計算公式被提出並應用提出的模型。

sentences.english: For an isolated system. You've seen this before, probably.
sentences.chinese: 對孤立系統，大家從前可能見過這個公式。

sentences.english: Green for work. This is the double integral of curl of this guy.
sentences.chinese: 功的格林公式，就是它的旋度的二重積分。

sentences.english: This paper derives corresponding computing formula for 2-D plane problem.
sentences.chinese: 本文僅就二維平面問題給出相應的計算公式。

sentences.english: The results from this equation of Karman constant agree with measured data.
sentences.chinese: 該卡門常數的理論公式與實測資料較爲吻合。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
